titles.title: HP581 Glory and praise to God

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Glory and praise to God
Who loves the human race
His all-creating word
Provides each child a place

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Glory and praise to Christ
Who from the Father came
The saviour of the world
Who calls this child by name

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
O Holy Spirit come
Your gifts of grace instil
All the good will of God
In this new life fulfil
